frontmatter.title: Fall Semester to Follow Accelerated Academic Calendar

node.excerpt: Campus & Community Dear Students, Faculty and Staff: This week we conclude the 2019-20 academic year at Syracuse University. It is true that our end-of-semester activities and traditions will look and feel different this year. However, I am convinced that what will come to distinguish this year—and these students, faculty and staff—is not a delayed graduation, or online classes, social distancing…
